channel.title: CVE Feed for Kingspan -- TMS300 CS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kingspan -- TMS300 CS

item.title: CVE-2022-2757|2024-08-03T00:46:04.440Z -- kingspan -- tms300%20cs
item.description: Due to the lack of adequately implemented access-control rules, all versions Kingspan TMS300 CS are vulnerable to an attacker viewing and modifying the application settings without authenticating by accessing a specific uniform resource locator (URL) on the webserver.
